body.name: Ninja - AD150 Foodi 8 Quart 6-in-1 DualZone 2-Basket Air Fryer with 2 Independent Frying Baskets, Match Cook & Smart Finish to Roast, Broil, Dehydrate & More for Quick, Easy Meals, Black
features: The first air fryer with two independent baskets that lets you cook two foods, two ways, at the same time, not back to back like a traditional single-basket air fryer
DualZone technology features smart finish feature for cooking two foods two ways that finish at the same time, and a match cook button to easily copy settings across zones for full eight-qt. capacity

Versatile 6-in-1 Functionality: This appliance serves as a multitasking marvel, offering six cooking functions including air frying, roasting, baking, broiling, dehydrating, and reheating, providing endless culinary possibilities in one compact unit.

Precise Air Circulation: Experience perfectly crispy results with the advanced air circulation system, ensuring even cooking and consistent textures across your dishes, all achieved with less oil for a healthier cooking option.

User-Friendly Design: The intuitive control panel and easy-to-use settings make cooking a breeze for both beginners and seasoned chefs. Cleanup is convenient with dishwasher-safe components, offering a hassle-free cooking experience from start to finish.
body.description: Meet the Ninja Foodi 6-in-1, 8 qt. two Basket Air Fryer with DualZone Technology. The first air fryer with two independent baskets that lets you cook two foods at the same time, not back-to-back like a traditional single-basket air fryer. Use Air fry, keep warm, roast, bake, reheat, and dehydrate functions all in one unit. The Ninja Foodi 6-in-1, 8 qt. two Basket Air Fryer with DualZone Technology offers both smart finish and match cook functionality with six programmable cooking functions that work in each zone. The smart finish feature intelligently manages your cooking so both food loads finish at the same time, while match cook duplicates your settings across both zones for increased capacity. Each 4 qt. zone has its own cyclonic fan and rapid heater along with easy-to-clean baskets and dishwasher-safe crisper plates. You will also get 15 chef-inspired recipes, additional meal options, and cooking charts to help you cook all your favorite snacks.
